age.Description: Age of the participant at time of testing

descriptive_SOZ.Description: Seizure Onset Zone of the participant

SOZ_laterality.Description: Seizure Onset Zone hemisphere. R for right, L for left

SOZ_region.Description: Seizure Onset Zone lobe (eg. temporal, frontal) or region (eg. insula)

TimeFromSleepOnset.Description: Time from sleep onset in minutes

SleepScoring.Description: Sleep stages according to AASM criteria in 30s epochs
